content: *welcome to our seventh wip wednesday crochet along i m so excited to be hosting this cal with everyone during our lives for wip wednesday on the coco crochet lee facebook page 1 crochet your first cabled blanket filled with amazing textured stitches this blanket features post stitches the diamond stitch as well as an 18-stitch centerpiece cable that is sure to delight for this crochet-along we will be learning the structure of a cabled blanket by breaking it up into 3 parts in the form of 3 ear warmers featuring the cables included there will be a live video tutorial during our wip wednesday lives for these instructional tutorials as well as full youtube tutorials for each of the ear warmer patterns you can find us at 830pm est on the coco crochet lee facebook page every wednesday * **the schedule ** **before the cal** - order your lion brand yarn kit here >> https //bit ly/3d2hgfn 2 ****note** - this cal begins on wednesday november 24th ** when you order the lion brand yarn kit you will also receive the full digital pattern for this crochet along if you are not ordering the lion brand yarn kit the instructions will be released in parts on the coco crochet lee blog and on ravelry show off your blanket progress in the coco crochet lee community group 3 as well as update your ravelry project the full blanket instructions will go live on the 24th in case you would like to begin faster than the pace of the cal **about this design** crochet your first cabled blanket filled with amazing textured stitches this blanket features post stitches the diamond stitch as well as an 18-stitch centerpiece cable that is sure to delight you can find the lion brand kit for the molly cabled blanket here >> https //bit ly/3d2hgfn 4 you can purchase an inexpensive pdf to support my work read below **about this pattern** crochet your own molly cabled blanket using this crochet pattern in pdf format the finished sizes and measurements are throw = 36 x 48 this pattern contains written instructions in english and uses us crochet terminology the printable pdf has a total of 3 pages including the cover page available as an instant download **questions & returns** there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern **please note ** please note that this is an ad-free and specially formatted pdf version of my free crochet pattern that can be found on my blog by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns **you can find the free version here ** https //www cococrochetlee com/post/wip-wednesday-crochet-along-the-molly-cabled-blanket/ 5 **find me on social media** patterns https //www cococrochetlee com 6 instagram https //www instagram com/coco crochet lee 7 facebook https //www facebook com/cococrochetlee 8 tiktok https //www tiktok com/@cococrochetlee 9 pinterest https //www pinterest com/cococrochetlee 10 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucur9g37am0rlp-ref1x7gsg 11 1 https //www facebook com/cococrochetlee 2
